item.title: Dangerous play area, 28th July
item.description:
Many wet leaves need to be cleared from around the play area. I realise it is a water feature but the leaves are making it dangerously slippery. It's difficult to tell a child not to run when in a playground!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heron Hill, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet
